Methods Work Together","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c696f71f-7b83-4b62-8d60-9e4c9a07e736","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"javascript"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Analysis Workflow:

1. CREATE NODE
   create_node("requests")
   → Adds "requests" to graph with empty imports set

2. CREATE EDGE
   create_edge("requests")
   → Records: current_module imports "requests"

3. RETRIEVE NODE
   get_node("requests")
   → Check if already registered (to avoid duplicates)

4. QUERY DEPENDENCIES
   get_imports("my_app")
   → Get list of all modules imported by "my_app"

5. EXPORT RESULTS
   get_import_graph()
   → Return complete graph for analysis","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e1c75f25-d7c5-4598-aaa6-fb00494fb7a9","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"289572f7-4b23-48b4-bc99-04eec07766a8","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Key
